name: Cosmo Player Z
description:
A Sci-Fi action game for a single player bringing you to fight rebellions, level up your character and choose new skills, dress up your character in the epic space wars.


This title is easy to play. All you have to do is to move the character and the character automatically attacks enemies, so that you can casually play this title without a technical skill such as aim.


Various kinds of skills allows you to select a fighting strategy - long-range, close-combat, and defensive - and some combinations of skills generate a new power that embraces a great potential for sweeping away enemies. This roguelike skill-building featured this title.


Some of the skills include those that change the player character's outfit. In addition to strategically choosing the best skills, you can also choose to coordinate your main character in a lovely way. The clothes you change can be viewed on the pause screen and home screen. You can also receive bonuses if you complete an area with the same hairstyle, top, and bottoms in the same outfit.
This title has a variety of unique boss characters. There's a dictator on a planet where only the strongest are allowed to wear cute clothes, a princess who's been stealing motorcycles since she was five, and a clothing designer who wages war by remote work. The short stories woven by the unique enemy characters and the well-polished clothing designs are also the charm of this title.
